DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate pharmacokinetic drug interaction Udenafil Dapoxetine healthy male subject Design : Randomized , open-label , 3-treatment , 6-sequence , 3-period crossover study Investigational Product : Udenafil , Dapoxetine
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Investigate Pharmacokinetic Drug Interaction Between Udenafil Dapoxetine
DOC.criteria: Male volunteer age 20 45 year old screening Body mass index ( BMI ) range 19 27 ㎏/㎡ Sitting position blood pressure meet criteria time screening ( 90mmHg≤Systolic blood pressure≤140mmHg ) History clinically significant disease kidney , liver biliary system , digestive system , respiratory , musculoskeletal , endocrine , neurological psychiatric blood tumor system , cardiovascular system , etc . History gastrointestinal disease gastrointestinal operation might affect study drug absorption Clinically significant hypersensitivity history hypersensitivity reaction Udenafil , Dapoxetine ingredient include element family drug , medication ≥ 1.5 fold normal upper limit ( UNL ) level ALT , AST Alcohol , excessive intake ( > 21 units/week ) Excessive smoker ( > 10 cigarette/day )
